body: Dam mate that was a based story but it somehow succeeded in making me feel kinda uncomfortable which even the darkest stuff here normally fails to do so I really gotta hand it to ya for achieving that. Still a good read though.

Mrs. Fluffy is a cat. One time when she was eating a rat. Mr. Fluffy showed up and asked her, "What's that?" Mrs. Fluffy chocked and spat. She has never seen such a huge and ugly rat. Mr. Fluffy, taken aback by her reaction. Suddenly grew a massive erection. "What the... " muttered Mrs. Fluffy. "I must fuck this pussy!!" Says Mr. Fluffy.  To which she replied, "Get the hell away from me!" "Now! I will take your virginity!" The cat tripped and was caught when she tried to run. Shortly after the koala began to have his fun. Again and again the koala came. Their moans alerted the human who had them tamed. And that's the story of how they were named.

Mr. Fluffy is a Koala. He's from Australia. Koalas are cute and fluffy. Male Koalas love fcking that cunny. Koalas have no tails. Koalas love raping their females. If she refuses to have sex with the he. He makes her fall down from the tree. "OOOOOOOOUUUUGGHHH CUNNY!" Says Mr Fluffy.
